code: import Firebase from"firebase";export var saveNewIndexAPI=function saveNewIndexAPI(value,name){Firebase.database().ref("indexes/"+name).set({value:value});};export var updateIndexesAPI=function updateIndexesAPI(value){Firebase.database().ref("indexes/").set(value);console.log("DATA SAVED");};export var getIndexesAPI=function getIndexesAPI(callback){var ref=Firebase.database().ref("/indexes");ref.on("value",function(snapshot){var data=snapshot.val();callback(data);});};export var updateTemplateAPI=function updateTemplateAPI(id,value){var existingUser=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("logged_user"));Firebase.database().ref(existingUser+"/templates/"+id).set(value);};export var getTemplatesAPI=function getTemplatesAPI(callback){var existingUser=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("logged_user"));var ref=Firebase.database().ref(existingUser+"/templates");ref.on("value",function(snapshot){var data=snapshot.val();callback(data);});};export var getTemplateByIdAPI=function getTemplateByIdAPI(id,callback){var existingUser=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("logged_user"));console.log(id);var ref=Firebase.database().ref(existingUser+"/templates/"+id);ref.on("value",function(snapshot){var data=snapshot.val();callback(data);});};
